property.name: dfs.nameservices
property.description: nameservices逻辑名 Comma-separated list of nameservices. as same as fs.defaultFS in core-site.xml.

property.name: dfs.namenode.rpc-address.HDFS_DFS_NAMESERVICES.nn2
property.description: RPC address for nomenode2 of hadoop-test

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address.HDFS_DFS_NAMESERVICES.nn1
property.description: Hdfs HA: dfs.namenode.http-address.[nameservice ID] http 通信地址 The address and the base port where the dfs namenode1 web ui will listen on.

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address.HDFS_DFS_NAMESERVICES.nn2
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode2 web ui will listen on.
